edits.original_text: Marseilles lay burning in the sun, one day.
edits.corrected_text: Marseilles lay burning in the sun, one day.

edits.original_text: A blazing sun upon a fierce August day was no greater rarity in southern France then,
edits.corrected_text: A blazing sun upon a fierce August day was no greater rarity in southern France then,

edits.original_text: Everything in Marseilles, and about Marseilles, had stared at the fiery sky,
edits.corrected_text: Everything in Marseilles, and about Marseilles, had stared at the fiery sky,

edits.original_text: and been stared at in return, until a staring habit had become universal there.
edits.corrected_text: and been stared at in return, until a staring habit had become universal there.

edits.original_text: Strangers were stared out of counter-
edits.corrected_text: Strangers were stared out of counter-
